about_me_text.en:
Developer, data scientist and teacher. I'm passionate about technology, music, blockchains, programming, internet subcultures, online privacy and security, mathematics, linguisitics and languages in general.

Always open to new challenges and ideas. I'm currently focusing on writing things that interest me on my blog and actively studying stuff that calls my attention. In particular, I've been doing CTFs to learn Solidity.
